item.description:
Who loves Mexico? Yep, all of us. Never really been, but I'd sure like to go.

Now, it's virtually impossible to plan a Mexican themed pub crawl because there's not enough Mexican themed bars, but we have found a solution....

 

Howl At the Moon is serving Margaritas! They literally play the best music inside Boston city limits. Click the below URL or paste it into your browser to see what the dueling piano theme is. Guarantee you'll love at least 80% of the music.

http://www.howlatthemoon.com/locations/location-boston

 

WHEN: 6PM (Doors open at 5pm, I'll be in the corner by the windows by 530PM)

COVER: $10 at 6pm. If you want to beat the cover, as I do, get there early

BOOZE SITUATION: Coronas, 1800 Margaritas, Margarita Blue Buckets (86 ounces)

TIME FRAME: Come and go as you please, but I have to warn you, they do get a line outside the door that goes around the block, and it is Cinco de Maio

Suerte amigos! Hasta el Cinco maio!

 

Cinco de Maio es un dia muy importante por los Mexicanos por todos partes, excepto Mexico...Es lo que E-card me dijo.
item.how_to_find_us: Walk in, take a left, tables by the windows
item.name: Margaritas y Musica por Cinco de Mayo!
